content:
Chicken breasts are a fantastic choice for a dinner party. Here are some delicious and easy-to-make recipe ideas that feature chicken breasts as the main attraction:

**Recipe Ideas:**

1. **Lemon Garlic Chicken**: Marinate chicken breasts in a mixture of lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, and herbs, then grill or bake until cooked through. Serve with roasted veggies and quinoa or rice.
2. **Chicken Fajitas**: Slice chicken breasts into strips and sauté with bell peppers, onions, and fajita seasoning. Serve with warm flour or corn tortillas, sour cream, and salsa.
3. **Chicken Parmesan**: Bread chicken breasts with Italian-seasoned breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese, then bake until crispy. Serve with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese on top of pasta or with a side of garlic bread.
4. **Chicken Caesar Wraps**: Grill or bake chicken breasts, then wrap them in Caesar-dressed romaine lettuce leaves with croutons and shaved parmesan cheese.
5. **Honey Mustard Chicken**: Glaze chicken breasts with a mixture of honey, Dijon mustard, and thyme, then bake until caramelized. Serve with roasted carrots and Brussels sprouts.

**Tips and Variations:**

* To add some crunch, top your chicken breasts with chopped nuts or seeds (e.g., almonds, pecans, or sesame seeds) before baking.
* For an Asian-inspired twist, marinate chicken breasts in a mixture of soy sauce, ginger, and honey, then serve with steamed broccoli and rice.
* To make your dishes more substantial, serve chicken breasts with roasted potatoes, sweet potatoes, or cauliflower mash.

**Using Your $5 Off Coupon:**

Congratulations on remembering your $5 off coupon! You can use it to stock up on chicken breasts, veggies, and other ingredients for your dinner party. With the coupon, you can get:

* 5-6 boneless, skinless chicken breasts (depending on the price)
* A bag of mixed veggies (e.g., bell peppers, onions, carrots)
* A jar of marinara sauce or fajita seasoning
* A block of parmesan cheese or a bag of breadcrumbs

Remember to check the prices and calculate your total before applying the coupon to maximize your savings.

I hope these recipe ideas and tips help you plan a delicious and memorable dinner party!
